phrs.translation: 矫情, 过分伤感的, 过分感伤的

sentences.sentence: What a piece of schmaltzy music ! ;
While the Cruze AD was schmaltzy, it got me thinking about how big a role technology now plays even in this, um, corporeal aspect of our lives.
sentences.translation: 克鲁兹的这个广告虽然有点让人伤感，不过它让我开始思考，科技在我们生活的有形方面扮演了多大的角色。
